com.github.zk1931.jzab

Class RollingLog

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.zk1931.jzab.RollingLog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Log, AutoCloseable

    public class RollingLog
extends Object
implements Log
    Rolling log implementation. It's a wrapper of SimpleLog. It maintains a list of log files, once the size of the log file reaches certain threshold, we'll roll the log.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RollingLog.RollingLogIterator
      An implementation of LogIterator for RollingLog.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.github.zk1931.jzab.Log

      • truncate

        public void truncate(Zxid zxid)
              throws IOException
        Truncates this transaction log at the given zxid. This method deletes all the transactions with zxids higher than the given zxid.
        Specified by:
        truncate in interface Log
